Where is the crack directory?

Oh! I see!

Okai, for those who dont know...

Once you have downloaded and installed the game, Get to the ISO file, (or the image, in this case, the CUE file) and right click, open with, WinRAR, then once it comes up, open "Crack" And extract the file called "Sims2EP8.exe" (i think its ".exe" . . . ).

Copy / cut this file in to .. by default..

c:\\program files\EA games\ Sims 2 teen style stuff\ TSBin

Replace the current file of the same name...

FOR ALL YOU PEOPLE WHO ARE TRYING TO GET THIS TO WORK:

After installation of Sims 2, extract the file contents to ANY location. THEN, mount the .cue file in Daemon Tools or Alcohol 120% (52% works too)
THEN, go to "My Computer" and double click on the virtual drive. From there, select your language, then enter one of the keys in the description, and install.

Hope I helped!!
